description: A Software Trouble report is sent by whatever application
encountering a problem during its execution and would
want to make the user aware of problem for maintenance purpose.

event.Summary: Application encountering a problem during its execution and would want to make the user aware of problem for maintenance purpose

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-EVB-MIB::evbVdpAssocTlvTrap ALCATEL-IND1-EVB-MIB::evbPortId i 9999 IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbSbpPortNumber u 9999 IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSIID s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEX IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSIIDType i 1 IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSITypeVersion s E IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSIMvFormat i 1

description: IfIndex uniquely identify this port table.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-EVB-MIB::evbPortId

description: The SBP port number.
variables.name: IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbSbpPortNumber

description: This object specifies the VSIID that uniquely identifies the VSI
in the DCN
variables.name: IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSIID

description: This object specifies the VSIID Type for the VSIID in the DCN
variables.name: IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSIIDType

description: The VSI Type Version is an integer identifier designating the
expected/desired VTID version. The VTID version allows a VSI
Manager Database to contain multiple versions of a given VSI
Type, allowing smooth migration to newer VSI types.
variables.name: IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSITypeVersion

description: This object specifies the MAC/VLAN format.
basic - Basic MAC/VLAN format
partial - Partial MAC/VLAN format
vlanOnly - Vlan-only MAC/VLAN format
variables.name: IEEE8021-EVB-MIB::ieee8021BridgeEvbVSIMvFormat
